body:
On Media
By DYLAN BYERS and  HADAS GOLD
7/29/15 8:06 PM EDT
New polls will determine the inaugural Republican debate.
Fox News lowers the threshold for the undercard round.
Donald Trump has schooled the GOP establishment.
Conservative media wields great influence over the party.
Jon Stewart attended private meetings with the president.
And fifteen percent of Americans don't use the Internet.
Been traveling, folks! Regular coverage resumes tomorrow.
© 2015 POLITICO LLC

title: Remainders
